data.title: England weather in October 2024: How hot & sunny?
data.meta_description: England October weather - temperature, rainfall & sunshine. Check how hot & sunny in October 2024 for England
data.text:
England weather in October 2024

Expect 15°C daytime maximum temperatures in the shade with on average 3 hours of sunshine per day in England in October. Check more long-term weather averages for England in October before you book your next holiday to England in 2024/2025.

15

15°C max day temperature

3 hours of sunshine per day

13

13 days with some rainfall

8

8°C min night temperature

11

11 hours of daylight per day

0

No heat & humidity

58

58 mm of monthly rainfall

2

2 (Low) UV index

The October weather guide for England (London) shows long term weather averages processed from data supplied by CRU (University of East Anglia), the Met Office & the Netherlands Meteorological Institute. Find out more about our data sources.
